original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy an apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ▁katamaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ aṃ

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
analyzed: ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy an apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ▁ ā patt ādhikaraṇ aṃ ▁pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñja n apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ▁katamaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ aṃ

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñja n apaccayā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁adhikaraṇ ānaṃ ā patt ādhikaraṇ aṃ
